about_the_game:
Welcome to Project Bengal, an open-world action-adventure set in the vibrant, bustling streets of Bangladesh. Immerse yourself in a richly detailed world where you can free-roam, engage in intense action, and live out your own criminal empire story—all in Bangla language.

Key Features:

  • Explore a Living, Breathing World: Roam the streets, hills, and cities of a detailed, open-world environment inspired by real-life Bangladesh. Whether you're cruising through crowded markets, speeding down highways, or navigating rural backroads, every corner of the world is packed with life.

  • Role-Playing Story: Dive into a series of immersive, narrative-driven roleplay stories inspired by the world of crime, power struggles, and gang warfare. Each mission and event unfolds a deep, branching storyline with unexpected twists and turns.

  • Free Roam and Dynamic Action: Free-roaming gameplay lets you take control of the city, explore every nook and cranny, and interact with a diverse range of characters. From high-speed car chases to intense shootouts, the world is your playground. Engage in thrilling firefights, escape from the law, and climb your way up the criminal ladder.

  • Vehicle Combat & Driving: Jump behind the wheel of a variety of vehicles, from luxury cars to motorcycles. The game features smooth driving mechanics and vehicle combat, allowing you to race, chase, or shoot your way out of any situation.

  • Character Customization: Customize your protagonist’s appearance, from outfits to tattoos, hairstyles, and more. Build your character to match your unique style and preferences as you rise through the ranks in the criminal underworld.

  • Mixed Visual Style: Experience a world that blends realism with stylized art. The game offers a visually striking balance, where the environments feel immersive, yet the characters and world carry a unique, artistic flair.

  • Bangla Language and Local Culture: The game’s rich narrative and dialogue are fully localized in Bangla, bringing you closer to the culture, atmosphere, and language of Bangladesh. From the bustling streets of Dhaka to the serene rural villages, every aspect of the game draws inspiration from the real-world setting.

  • No Multiplayer, Pure Single-Player Fun: While the game focuses on a rich, story-driven single-player experience, you can enjoy all the depth and freedom of an open-world RPG without the need for online play. Immerse yourself in a world of your own making.

  • Dynamic Weather and Day/Night Cycle: Experience the city and countryside as they change with the time of day and weather conditions. Rainstorms, sunny days, and nighttime adventures all bring their own challenges and opportunities.
